00001 <?php
00002 /* SVN FILE: $Id: Timer.php 208 2009-02-25 16:04:11Z david@ramaboo.com $ */
00003 /**
00004  * @brief Timer class.
00005  * 
00006  * This class creates a simple timer usefull for timing blocks of code.
00007  * 
00008  * @class       Boo_Timer
00009  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00010  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00011  * @copyright   2009 David Singer
00012  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00013  * @version     2.0.1
00014  */
00015 
00016 class Boo_Timer {
00017     
00018     /**
00019      * @brief Start time.
00020      */
00021     protected $startTime = false;
00022     
00023     /**
00024      * @brief Total time.
00025      */
00026     protected $totalTime = false;
00027     
00028     /**
00029      * @brief Default constructor.
00030      * @return void
00031      */
00032     public function __construct() {}
00033     
00034     /**
00035      * @brief Start the timer.
00036      * @return float The start time.
00037      */
00038     public function start() {
00039         $time = $this->getMicroTime();
00040         $this->startTime = $time;
00041         return $time;
00042     }
00043     
00044     /**
00045      * @brief Stop the timer.
00046      * @return float The stop time.
00047      */
00048     public function stop() {
00049         if ($this->startTime === false) {
00050             trigger_error('Timer has not been started, try Boo_Timer::start() first', E_USER_NOTICE);
00051             return false;
00052         }
00053         $time = $this->getMicroTime();
00054         // set total time
00055         $this->totalTime += $time - $this->startTime;
00056         // reset start time
00057         $this->startTime = false;
00058         return $time;
00059     }
00060     
00061     /**
00062      * @brief Gets the time.
00063      * @return float The time. If the timer is stopped the total time will be returned.
00064      * if the timer is still running then the current time running will be returned.
00065      */
00066     function getTime() {
00067         $time = $this->getMicroTime();
00068         if ($this->startTime === false) {
00069             // timer is stopped
00070             return $this->totalTime;
00071         } else {
00072             // timer is still running
00073             $currentTime =($time - $this->startTime) + $this->totalTime;
00074             return $currentTime;
00075         }
00076     }
00077     
00078     /**
00079      * @brief Returns the micro time.
00080      * @return float The micro time.
00081      */
00082     static function getMicroTime() {
00083         $time = microtime();
00084         $time = explode(' ', $time);
00085         try {
00086             $time = $time[1] + $time[0];
00087         } catch (Exception $e) {
00088             trigger_error('Call to microtime() failed', E_USER_ERROR);
00089         }
00090         
00091         return $time;
00092     }
00093     
00094     /**
00095      * @brief Resets the timer.
00096      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00097      */
00098     public function reset() {
00099         $this->startTime = false;
00100         $this->totalTime = false;
00101         return true;
00102     }
00103 }
